name: wishlist-sb-be
description: Backend que controla um sistema de Wishlist para e-commerce

scripts.git-flow-update: git fetch origin develop:develop && git fetch origin main:main
scripts.git-flow-push: git push origin develop:develop && git push origin main:main
scripts.mvn:setversion: mvn versions:set -DnewVersion=%npm_package_version% -DgenerateBackupPoms=false && npm run git-add-commit -- "chore(pom): newVersion"
scripts.hotfix-win:version: git pull origin && standard-version && npm run mvn:setversion && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run hotfix:finish
scripts.hotfix-win:finish: npm run git-flow-update && git flow hotfix finish -n %npm_package_version% && npm run git-flow-push
scripts.release-win:version: git pull origin && standard-version && npm run mvn:setversion && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run release:finish
scripts.release-win:finish: npm run git-flow-update && git flow release finish -n %npm_package_version% && npm run git-flow-push
scripts.mvn-macLinux:setversion: mvn versions:set -DnewVersion=$npm_package_version -DgenerateBackupPoms=false && npm run git-add-commit -- "chore(pom): newVersion"
scripts.hotfix-macLinux:version: git pull origin && standard-version && npm run mvn-macLinux:setversion && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run hotfix-macLinux:finish
scripts.hotfix-macLinux:finish: npm run git-flow-update && git flow hotfix finish -n $npm_package_version && npm run git-flow-push
scripts.release-macLinux:version: git pull origin && standard-version && npm run mvn-macLinux:setversion && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run release-macLinux:finish
scripts.release-macLinux:finish: npm run git-flow-update && git flow release finish -n $npm_package_version && npm run git-flow-push
